Feature Details

Each plan includes different capabilities:

  • Basic features
    • Dashboard access
    • Basic analytics
      • Page views
      • Unique visitors
      • Bounce rate
    • Email notifications
  • Advanced features (Pro & Enterprise)
    • Custom domains
    • Advanced analytics
      • Conversion tracking
      • A/B testing results
    • Priority support

Setup Steps

  1. Create an account at example.com/signup
  2. Choose your plan
  3. Configure your settings:
    1. Set your domain
    2. Add team members
    3. Configure integrations
  4. Deploy your first project

Note: All prices are in USD. Taxes may apply depending on your region.
